data.title: 'I felt blessed when Shivanna agreed to work with me'
data.meta_description: The film, made under Jayanna Combines, will likely go on floors in June. The  rest of the cast is now being finalised.
data.text:
BENGALURU: Actor Sriimurali took to social media on Sunday morning to announce that he is working on a film with Shivarajkumar. Debutant Narthan will helm the project, which will succeed the actor's hit film Rathaavara.

His Facebook status said, ‘Couldn’t have asked anything Bigger than this. I’m the Happiest... and yesss... next’uh...Namm SHIVANNA (My Maama) Jothe. TITLE will be announced soon... thanks for ur patience.Nimma SriiMurali. JaiiiHind. JaiiiBhuwaneshwari. (sic)' Sriimurali told City Express that he couldn’t have asked for more.

“I approached him (Shivarajkumar) last week and narrated the story to him. He liked it and said yes. I feel blessed that Shivanna agreed to work with me. This is the first time I will be working with my cousin,” he says.

The character was not written with Shivarajkumar in mind. However, when the makers were looking for an actor for the role, they thought Shivanna will fit the bill, says Sriimurali. ’
